name: Clones (itch) (CrazyError454)
description:
Welcome to "Clones". Your goal is to defeat every each clone until,well, until you get bored.

You've got awesome powerups (Coming Soon) and potions such as poison that can help you a lot!

To buy potions you need coins. You get coins after you reach 500+ points, then the game automatically buys 10 coins.

If you don't want to start all over, just save by clicking on a blue button down in the bottom right.

Also make sure you read the README.txt file on every each version so you can see whats new.

I also have plans for future sequels that contain stories that will blow your mind! Lol not that good writer though.

Anyway, enjoy what you have, tell me any bugs or glitches that you found so I can fix them.(Already know some of them my self)

Enjoy!
